page.title: 13Playground Games
page.content: {Cowboy Joe This is a skipping game.The aim of the game is not to stop the rope.Two people turn the ends.First of all we jump in.After that we sing the rhyme Cowboy Joe from Mexico Stick them up Pull them up Drop your guns and pick them up Cowbow Joe from Mexico. When saying the rhyme we do the action.When one has finished another person has a turn.We carry on until everyone has had a go.Then we start all over again.We raise our arms into the air.We drop our invisible guns.Then we pick them up again and go out of the rope.
